Name: Poseidon
Equipment_Options: This model is equipped with Poseidon’s Trident

Unit_Abilities.Ability_Effect: Any attack that targets this model is treated as having a Rend characteristic of 0.

Instead of charging in the Charge Step this model may elect to use the Force of the Sea to propel itself into combat. Roll 2D6; On a result of 2-7 place this model within 1” of the nearest enemy Formation and on a result of 8+ place this model within 1” of any enemy Formation on the battlefield.

Spells.Name: Rage of the Ocean (30)
Spells.Effect: Select D3 enemy Formations within 18” of the caster. Then roll 2D6 for each model in each Formation (to a maximum of 15 D6). For each 4+ that model’s Formation suffers 1 Ethereal Damage.
